instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No wifi
threads.message:
i got this <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> that boots and runs awesome but shows no hardware detected where the wifi symbol is. i check the inductor L3404 and have 3.32v on both side when the card is connected. 
Not really sure where to go first on this thing.

i did find that a couple resistors measured a little low.
<RESISTOR>R3454</RESISTOR> 156.9 kohms
<RESISTOR>R3455</RESISTOR> 72.5 kohms

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No wifi
threads.message: First thing is to swap the cable/card of course.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No wifi
threads.message:
yep. did that before checking resistors. 10 seconds after posting here i noticed 11 components missing that all seem to go to cpuvcore, replaced them from donor had to run 3 wires. Looks like some one slipped with a screw driver or some shit. will test in the morning. 

Surprised this computer still worked like that.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No wifi
threads.message: might as well close this thread this board is going in the donor pile. ty

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No wifi
threads.message: Send it to Apple and claim it has GPU issues. Insist and bitch at them and it will be replaced.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No wifi
threads.message: lol was thinking about that thanks.
